name: Community Development Centre

address: Opposite Maharishi Vidya Mandir, Near Lodhi Hostel

briefDescription: CDC is working in three districts in Madhya Pradesh state namely Balaghat, Mandla and Seoni. Organization works on various development issues i.e. health, livelihood & conservation, HIV AIDS, Women empowerment and local self-governance.

address: At Post Pandutala, Garhi, Tah. Baihar
